title: Let hi-speed clean your oven!
brief_description: An advertising film presenting Mrs Housewife attempting to remove built up grease from her oven. All her efforts fail until she tries ‘Hi-Speed’ stove cleaner which dissolves baked on grease without damaging the enamel. Provides an insight into mid 20th Century marketing and the representation of women in advertising.
